COMMENT_TX: originally scored PO1, changed to CS2 next day
ej,pujoa001,P,herna901,Balls and strikes $Albert Pujols ejected by HP umpire Angel Hernandez; he complained about the 3-1 called strike, then said some more as he went to first after the walk
ej,kingr001,P,crawj901,Check swing (after being removed) Ray King ejected by 1B umpire Jerry Crawford
$Ward hits for the cycle; first father son combo to hit for the cycle (Gary 9/18/1980)
ej,rhoda001,P,drecb901,Balls and strikes Arthur Rhodes ejected by HP umpire Bruce Dreckman
$Griffey's 500th career home run; the 20th player to reach that milestone
ej,larut101,M,cousd901,Balls and strikes Manager Tony LaRussa ejected by HP umpire Derryl Cousins
$Armas injured warming up, threw no pitches

$Edgar Renteria ran on the pitch and had rounded 3B when the ball was caught; he did not retouch on the way back to 2B; the Mets appealed at 3B and Renteria was called out; however, HP umpire Rob Drake had called time after the catch because catcher Vance Wilson had been hit on the head by the swing; after he had been treated and removed from the game the Mets appealed for a second time

ej,tavaj001,P,westj901,Pine tar on cap; threw a fit $Pirates Manager Lloyd McClendon asked umpires to inspect Julian Tavarez' dirty, smudged cap; umpire Joe West decided there was pine tar on the cap and ejected Tavarez, who asked HP umpire Ron Kulpa to go have a beer with him then tossed his cap into the stands; Tavarez took a few of his clean caps and put them on McClendon's desk
ej,nevip001,P,gormb901,Called third strike Phil Nevin ejected by HP umpire Brian Gorman
$Walker slipped fielding the ball and left game; MRI showed a small bone bruise
ej,webbb001,P,laynj901,Intentional HBP ej,pedra001,M,laynj901,Intentional HBP Brandon Webb and D-Backs Manager Al Pedrique ejected by HP umpire Jerry Layne
$Carpenter left game due to injured arm
